snippet: Top-ranked Novak Djokovic eased into the third round of the Madrid Open by beating Borna Coric 6-2, 6-4 on Wednesday....
lead_paragraph: Top-ranked Novak Djokovic eased into the third round of the Madrid Open by beating Borna Coric 6-2, 6-4 on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Djokovic Beats Coric, Advances to Madrid Open 3rd
headline.main: Djokovic Beats Coric, Advances to Madrid Open 3rd
